body_html:
I was able to get past the initial path issues on Fedora 27 with Negativo drivers by

export NVVMIR_LIBRARY_DIR=\usr\share\cuda
bazel build --config=opt --config=cuda --action_env="NVVMIR_LIBRARY_DIR=${NVVMIR_LIBRARY_DIR}" //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package

However the build still fails later on, when compiling with gcc 6.4 which is also provided by the aforementioned repository:
tens-build.txt
EDIT: The above error was solves with #16165 and TF now builds successfully.

body:
I was able to get past the initial path issues on Fedora 27 with Negativo drivers by 
```
export NVVMIR_LIBRARY_DIR=\usr\share\cuda
bazel build --config=opt --config=cuda --action_env="NVVMIR_LIBRARY_DIR=${NVVMIR_LIBRARY_DIR}" //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package
```
However the build still fails later on, when compiling with gcc 6.4 which is also provided by the aforementioned repository:
[tens-build.txt](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/files/1713722/tens-build.txt) 
EDIT: The above error was solves with  #16165 and TF now builds successfully.
